title: Plants vs Zombies Garden Warfare
description: REQUIRES XBOX LIVE GOLD, SOLD SEPARATELY.  The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese and Japanese.  Download the manual for this game by going to https://help.ea.com/en/tag/manuals and selecting your title from the Product drop down menu.  "Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare digs into the trenches with an explosive new Co-op and Multiplayer action experience. Blast zombies and plants across a mine-blowing world that delivers the depth of a traditional online shooter blended with the refreshing humor of Plants vs. Zombies.  KEY FEATURES: 24-player multiplayer action: Choose your side, plants or zombies 4-player online co-op: Take on zombie waves and unique new bosses Customization: Personalize your favorite and new plants and zombies"

contentRating.label: E10 (Everyone 10+)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Plants vs. Zombies™ Garden Warfare - Legends of the Lawn
childDownloads.description: Grow your legend in the outlandish new Plants vs. Zombies™ Garden Warfare update, Legends of the Lawn. Complete with a slew of new Character Variants, the tasty new Taco Bandits game mode, and a bountiful offering of customizations and consumables, your cultivated heroics will soon be the stuff of legends!

childDownloads.title: Plants vs. Zombies ™ Garden Warfare Trailer
childDownloads.description: Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare digs into the trenches with an explosive new action experience. Blast zombies, plants and new characters across a mine-blowing world that delivers the depth of a traditional online shooter blended with the refreshing humor of Plant vs. Zombies.  Take on Co-op and Multiplayer action with your friends and sow the seeds of victory!														 KEY FEATURES • 24-player multiplayer action: Choose your side, plants or zombies, in 24-player online battles • Customization: Personalize your favorite plants and zombies with hundreds of unique items and customizations • 4-player online co-op and split screen co-op: Join forces with friends in online 4-player cooperative mode or on the couch with split screen • New plants and zombies: Powerful new plants and zombies with a huge variety of abilities

childDownloads.title: Plants vs. Zombies™ Garden Warfare Zombie Class Trailer
childDownloads.description: Watch the zombies in multiplayer action, Soldier Zombie, Scientist, the Engineer and All-Star as they exploit the latest Zomboss technology to overwhelm and distract plant defenses.  Learn about the four zombie classes in this in-engine video that premiered during the EA Gamescom 2013 press briefing.

childDownloads.title: Plants vs. Zombies™ Garden Warfare Zomboss Down Trailer
childDownloads.description: The plants just blasted down the Zomboss blimp, packed full of zombies, who are now roaming the desert and battling their way through the wreckage and the local landscape to reach a normal-looking golf course – which may just be a super-secret facility housing a Cactus army being trained by none other than Crazy Dave (at least this is what Zomboss’ sneaky sources have told him). It all happens in the Zomboss Down Pack on the unbelievable new Desert Gardens & Graveyards Map, Cactus Canyon! The pulsating Pack also increases character cap and includes 8 fun new class variants  like the Archeologist Zombie, the Wrestling Star Zombie, the Law Pea and the Sun Pharaoh, that let you play your way (even if your way is a bit strange). In addition you’ll discover walloping weapon upgrades and weapon skins for new characters, new accessories, tattoos and facial hair, and even more – though that seems impossible! Shooters just got an awesome shot of weird in the arm!

childDownloads.title: Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare Garden Variety Pack
childDownloads.description: The Garden Variety Pack features 24 new ability upgrades for all characters, like Sunflower’s Solar Flare Beam, Chomper’s Super Goop that cements zombies in place, and the All-Star Zombie’s Ultra Tackle. These awesome upgrades give you even more loadout options for the battle in the fun-dead field! The pack also introduces the explosive new Gnome Bomb mode that challenges plants and zombies to work together to destroy each other’s reinforced garden or graveyard! There’s a funtastic new map to explore, and a yo-ho host of fresh Pirate Zombies for players to face in Sharkbite Shores and Port Scallywag, including a Map Pirate Zombie who shields himself with a trusty treasure map. Shooters just got weirder!

childDownloads.title: Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare Zomboss Down Pack
childDownloads.description: The plants just blasted down the Zomboss blimp, packed full of zombies, who are now roaming the desert and battling their way to a local golf course, which may just be a secret facility housing a Cactus army. It all happens in the Zomboss Down Pack on the unbelievable new Cactus Canyon Gardens & Graveyards Map! The pack also increases character level cap and adds 8 fun new characters like the Archeologist Zombie, the Wrestling Star Zombie, and the Law Pea, alongside weapon upgrades and weapon skins for new characters, new accessories, tattoos and facial hair, and even more – though that seems impossible! Shooters just got an awesome shot of weird in the arm!

childDownloads.title: Plants vs. Zombies™ Garden Warfare - Suburbination
childDownloads.description: The battle for suburbia rages on in the all-new Suburbination update for Plants vs. Zombies™ Garden Warfare. Packed with the new map Crash Course, game mode Suburbination, Plasma Peashooter character variant, and the tactically tasteful Bling Pack, players now have even more ways to stylishly dominate suburbia.

childDownloads.title: Plants vs. Zombies™ Garden Warfare - Tactical Taco Party Pack
childDownloads.description: Plants vs. Zombies™ Garden Warfare further expands its depth and tactical gameplay with the Tactical Taco Party Pack. This update contains the all-new map Jewel Junction, game mode Vanquish Confirmed, an 8 vs. 8 mixed mode playlist, and much more!
